description:
Takeru and Mika are shocked when they learn Akira has a new girlfriend. On his girlfriend’s request, Akira shows Akane around the base, but it’s all a trap. Once inside, Akane begins planting bombs throughout the base.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akira`s Girlfriend is a Woman Warrior!
アキラの恋人は女戦士
